Symptoms of hepatitis A can occur 2 to 7 weeks after coming into contact with the virus. Children younger than age 6 may have no symptoms. Older children and adults often get mild, flulike symptoms. See a doctor right away if you or a child in your care has symptoms of hepatitis A.",NIDDK,What I need to know about Hepatitis A
How to diagnose What I need to know about Hepatitis A ?,A blood test will show if you have hepatitis
